item.title: rcompendium
item.author: nicolas.casajus@fondationbiodiversite.fr (FRB-CESAB)
item.description: The aim of the package rcompendium is to make easier the creation of R package or research compendium (i.e. a predefined files/folders structure) so that users can focus on the code instead of wasting time organizing files.
